title: Short-Term Course for Strengthening Innovative Capabilities Using Design Thinking-Based OER in K-12

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Device Proficiency and General Understanding of Social Issues
context.additional_context: Practical innovation project development competency enhancement program for job seekers

learning_goals: Learners concretize social problem-solving ideas by applying the 5-stage design thinking process
Learners collect and analyze materials needed for innovative project planning using OER (Open Educational Resources)
Learners complete small-group team projects and produce presentation materials using collaboration tools
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
